folder: Clove Road & Hylan Boulevard, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
Clove Road, east from Hylan Boulevard. The road turns northward
at about Winfield Ave.
April 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
A view northward across the road, from a point east of Hylan
Boulevard.
April 22, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.

folder: Hylan Boulevard & Clove Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
Hylan Boulevard, at Clove Road, showing a miniature golf course.

April 22, 1932.

P. L. Sperr

folder: Hylan Boulevard & Clove Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
Hylan Boulevard, near Clove Road, showing the Old Mill road inn.

March 25, 1934.

P. L. Sperr
